com.facebook.giraph.hive.input.parser

Interface RecordParser<W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayParser, BytesParser, DefaultParser

    public interface RecordParser<W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HiveReadableRecord createRecord()
      Create an empty record.
      HiveReadableRecord parse(W value, HiveReadableRecord record)
      Parse a value.

    • Method Detail

      • createRecord

        HiveReadableRecord createRecord()
        Create an empty record. Will be called before any parse() calls are made. Will be passed in to parse() so that parser can reuse the record.
        Returns:
        record

      • parse

        HiveReadableRecord parse(W value,
                       HiveReadableRecord record)
                         throws IOException
        Parse a value.
        Parameters:
        value - data to parse
        record - created from createRecord()
        Returns:
        record with parsed data
        Throws:
        IOException - if any problemsÂ occur
